metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3019 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A DMA reentrancy issue leading to a use-after-free error was found in thee1000e NIC emulation code in QEMU. This issue could allow a privilegedguest user to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: qemu package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-10-12').
